(GMT +2) |utc_offset1_DST = |coordinates = |postal_code_type = Postcode |postal_code = 15401–15406 |area_code = +34 981 |website = http://www.ferrol.es/ |footnotes = }} Ferrol (In the neighbourhood of Strabo's Cape Nerium, modern day Cape Prior) (), is a city in the Province of A Coruña in Galicia, on the Atlantic coast in north-western Spain. According to the 2014 census, the city has a population of 70,389. ==References== Category:Province of A Coruña Category:Municipalities in Galicia
